item.title: Smarter identity security starts with AI
item.description:
Howdy folks! I’m happy to share that two powerful, AI-driven capabilities in Microsoft Entra are now generally available – both of which are designed to help you work smarter, reduce risk, and simplify how you manage identity and access:
Conditional Access Optimization Agent in Microsoft Entra — This agent scans your tenant daily for policy gaps as new users and applications come online. It offers precise, one-click remediations so you can keep policies up to date without the overhead.
